message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this fantastic product that I think you'll really appreciate. I'm confident it will meet your needs. I'm asking $250 for it.
Thank you Alice, but I think $250 is too high. I'm willing to offer $50 for the product.
Hi Bob, I understand your initial offer was lower. I've come down a bit. How about $220?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $220 is still too high for me. I can offer $60 for the product.
Alice, $190 is still above my budget. I can offer $70 for the product.
Bob, last try from my end. $160.
